name: PHASEEnvelopeSegment
desc: A curved portion of an envelope.

items.name: init(endPoint: simd_double2, curveType: PHASECurveType)
items.desc: Creates a curved portion of an envelope.

items.name: var curveType: PHASECurveType
items.desc: A curve along the envelope that shapes the segment.

items.name: var endPoint: simd_double2
items.desc: A point that identifies the end of the segment along the envelope.
